name: koteei
title: Kotei
article:
Kotei is a minimalist, dual-mode theme built for modern studios and creative agencies..


  • Learn more about Kotei
  • Get the full access bundle including all premium themes and lifetime access: https://lexingtonthemes.com/

All Pages

  • Landing page
  • About
  • Studio
  • Work x3 (CC)
  • Blog x3 (CC)
  • Store x3 (CC)

  • Sign up

(CC) = Content Collections

Features

  • Light and dark modes
  • Blog Tags
  • Reusable components
  • Search powered with Fuse JS
  • Content collections
  • Seo Optimized
  • Ongoing updates
  • Style guide
  • AOS Animations
  • Astro RSS
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
  • Tailwind CSS Forms
  • Tailwind Typography
